thread.title: Video: Enchanted forest nightwalk opens near Montreal
thread.title_full: Video: Enchanted forest nightwalk opens near Montreal - Telegraph

author: Rhiannon Edwards
title: Video: Enchanted forest nightwalk opens near Montreal
text: With illuminated trees in psychedelic colours and booming voices coming from nowhere, it looks and sounds like a scene from a futuristic Alice in Wonderland. Coaticook Gorge, a two hour drive east of Montreal , has teamed up with Moment Factory, an "immersive production company" that usually designs spectacular light shows for the stage, and for musical acts such as Arcade Fire, to create a 2km nightwalk with a lightshow based on the myths and legends of the park. • The 10 best places to visit in Canada Foresta Lumina - which was opened last year, when the video dates from - includes projections of mythical characters including fairies and the "Spirit of the Forest". The impressive light show includes a carpet of LEDs across the forest floor. • Beautiful timelapse video of Australia's Uluru The show is on at present on Friday and Saturday evenings until October 11. Adults $16 Canadian dollars (£7.80); child $9 (£4.40) gorgedecoaticook.qc.ca forestalumina.com
